QuestData.Title: Something Bold
QuestData.Description: By tradition, Wildhammer brides wear white to show their purity. In addition, they wear a crown of black feathers - to show their CHUTZPAH.$B$BOwl feathers make the boldest statement, and Fanny deserves nothing less. Tawny owls are native to the Highlands. Look for them circling near trees that grow along the cliffs, and take their feathers.$B$BYou'll probably want to kill 'em, first.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you work fast. Bold feathers for a bold woman. Well done!
